name: Dark Harvest (itch) (trimin, sniper_link)
description:
Your farm is invaded with monsters. As a farmer and a necromancer, you know how to grow pumpkins and raise them into horrifying soldiers. Use them to push back waves of monsters that are trying to destroy your farm!

LMB - To move around the farmer

RMB - To interact and perform actions, ie. getting water, watering plants, raising pumpkin soldiers

ESC - Open Pause Menu
